Cancun.name: Cancun
Cancun.smallDescription: Pretty nice place, very nice but across the years I've seen that this place is changing to small local shops from big shopping centers like in the US.

Queensland.name: Queensland
Queensland.smallDescription: The most beautiful and amazing trip I've done so far. Very dangerous country, crocodiles, octopus, casoars, snakes, spiders...

Los Angeles.name: Los Angeles
Los Angeles.smallDescription: American dream, famous place full of luxury and rich people (very known for most of them)

Dominican Republic.name: Dominican Republic
Dominican Republic.smallDescription: Post card paradise but in danger due to pollution.

Egypt.name: Egypt
Egypt.smallDescription: The place to go if you'd like to do diving session into the most beautiful sea of the world, nothing to compare with the caribbean ones.

Ireland.name: Cork
Ireland.smallDescription: Don't be afraid by the rain cause you'll obviously be under, that's why this country is so green after all.

Italy.name: Italy
Italy.smallDescription: I come from Italy by blood, South and North are not friendly to each other.

Spain.name: Madrid
Spain.smallDescription: Nice and warm, very attractive for holidays.

Cuba.name: Cuba
Cuba.smallDescription: Cars are really famous there cause of their design old fashioned.

Luxembourg.name: Luxembourg
Luxembourg.smallDescription: Really small, could go to one side to another in 2 hours of driving. Not known by most of people but very interesting.

England.name: London
England.smallDescription: So much too see there, but easily reachable. Harry Potter's country.

Tanzania.name: Tanzania
Tanzania.smallDescription: Not as touristic as Kenya and that's good, people are really friendly and nice with strangers.

Amsterdam.name: Amsterdam
Amsterdam.smallDescription: Small city, very nice and entertaining (museums, neighborhoods...).
